item.title: Decoding the Somali Mind: A Guide for Expats (Anecdotal, Not Definitive Version): Responsibility
item.description: This is a new series containing a few stories which have stood out in my time here in Somaliland and have helped me to understand a bit more a culture that in many ways is very different from my own, but in many ways is not. This series explores those differences. This entry is about relationships in Somaliland.
